problem_names:
lemma lspace_1:
  assumes "S \<in> sets lebesgue"
  shows "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) 1 \<longleftrightarrow> f absolutely_integrable_on S"

lemma lspace_ennreal_iff:
  assumes "p > 0"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p) = {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S). integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. (norm(f x) powr p))}"

lemma lspace_iff:
  assumes "\<infinity> > p" "p > 0"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) p = {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S). integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. (norm(f x) powr (enn2real p)))}"

lemma lspace_iff':
  assumes p: "\<infinity> > p" "p > 0" and S: "S \<in> sets lebesgue"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) p = {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S). (\<lambda>x. (norm(f x) powr (enn2real p))) integrable_on S}"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")

lemma lspace_mono:
  assumes "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) q" and S: "S \<in> lmeasurable" and "p > 0" "p \<le> q" "q < \<infinity>"
  shows "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

lemma lspace_inclusion:
  assumes "S \<in> lmeasurable" and "p > 0" "p \<le> q" "q < \<infinity>"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) q \<subseteq> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

lemma lspace_const:
  fixes p::real
  assumes "p > 0""S \<in> lmeasurable"
  shows "(\<lambda>x. c) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

lemma lspace_max:
  fixes p::real
  assumes "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p" "g \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p" "p > 0"
  shows "(\<lambda>x. max (f x) (g x)) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

lemma lspace_min:
  fixes p::real
  assumes "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p" "g \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p" "p > 0"
  shows "(\<lambda>x. min (f x) (g x)) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

lemma Lp_space_numeral:
  assumes "numeral n > (0::int)"
  shows "space\<^sub>N (\<LL> (numeral n) M) = {f \<in> borel_measurable M. integrable M (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> ^ numeral n)}"
translations:
lemma lspace_1:
  assumes "S \<in> sets lebesgue"
  shows "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) 1 \<longleftrightarrow> f absolutely_integrable_on S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) 1) = (f absolutely_integrable_on S)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<in> sets lebesgue

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) 1) = (f absolutely_integrable_on S)
by (simp add: L1_space integrable_restrict_space set_integrable_def)

lemma lspace_ennreal_iff:
  assumes "p > 0"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p) = {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S). integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. (norm(f x) powr p))}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p) =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr p)}
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p) =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr p)}
by (fastforce simp: Lp_measurable Lp_D intro: Lp_I)

lemma lspace_iff:
  assumes "\<infinity> > p" "p > 0"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) p = {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S). integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. (norm(f x) powr (enn2real p)))}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) p =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p)}
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) p =

obtain q::real where "p = enn2real q"

proof (prove)

 1. (\<And>q.
        p = ennreal (enn2real (ennreal q)) \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using Lp_cases assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<And>p2.
              \<lbrakk>?p = ennreal p2; 0 < p2; 0 < ?p\<rbrakk>
              \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis;
   ?p = 0 \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis;
   ?p = \<infinity> \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis
  p < \<infinity>
  0 < p

goal (1 subgoal):

        p = ennreal (enn2real (ennreal q)) \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

this:
  p = ennreal (enn2real (ennreal q))

goal (1 subgoal):

    {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p)}
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  p = ennreal (enn2real (ennreal q))
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  p = ennreal (enn2real (ennreal q))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) p =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p)}
using assms lspace_ennreal_iff

proof (prove)
using this:
  p = ennreal (enn2real (ennreal q))
  p < \<infinity>
  0 < p
  0 < ?p \<Longrightarrow>
  lspace (lebesgue_on ?S) (ennreal ?p) =
  {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on ?S).
   integrable (lebesgue_on ?S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr ?p)}

goal (1 subgoal):

by auto

proof (state)
this:

   integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p)}

No subgoals!
qed

lemma lspace_iff':
  assumes p: "\<infinity> > p" "p > 0" and S: "S \<in> sets lebesgue"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) p = {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S). (\<lambda>x. (norm(f x) powr (enn2real p))) integrable_on S}"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) p =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
    \<subseteq> {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
                 (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}
 2. {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}
    \<subseteq> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
show "?lhs \<subseteq> ?rhs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
    \<subseteq> {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
                 (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}
using assms integrable_on_lebesgue_on

proof (prove)
using this:
  p < \<infinity>
  0 < p
  S \<in> sets lebesgue
  \<lbrakk>integrable (lebesgue_on ?S) ?f; ?S \<in> sets lebesgue\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?f integrable_on ?S

goal (1 subgoal):

    \<subseteq> {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
                 (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}
by (auto simp: lspace_iff)

proof (state)
this:
  lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
  \<subseteq> {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
               (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S).
     (\<lambda>x. norm (f x) powr enn2real p) integrable_on S}
    \<subseteq> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (prove)

                          (\<lambda>xa. \<bar>x xa\<bar> powr enn2real p)

lemma lspace_mono:
  assumes "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) q" and S: "S \<in> lmeasurable" and "p > 0" "p \<le> q" "q < \<infinity>"
  shows "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
have "p < \<infinity>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p < \<infinity>
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) q
  S \<in> lmeasurable
  0 < p
  p \<le> q
  q < \<infinity>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p < \<infinity>
by (simp add: top.not_eq_extremum)

proof (state)
this:
  p < \<infinity>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
with assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) q
  S \<in> lmeasurable
  0 < p
  p \<le> q
  q < \<infinity>
  p < \<infinity>
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) q
  S \<in> lmeasurable
  0 < p
  p \<le> q
  q < \<infinity>
  p < \<infinity>

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (clarsimp simp add: lspace_iff')

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>S \<in> lmeasurable; 0 < p; p \<le> q; q < \<top>; p < \<top>;
     f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S);
     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real q) integrable_on S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (\<lambda>x.
                          \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p) integrable_on
                      S

show "(\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p) integrable_on S"
      if "f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)"
        and "(\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real q) integrable_on S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p) integrable_on S
proof (rule measurable_bounded_by_integrable_imp_integrable)

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p)
    \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
 2. ?g integrable_on S
 3. \<And>x.
       x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow>
       norm (\<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p) \<le> ?g x
 4. S \<in> sets lebesgue
show "(\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p) \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p)
    \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
using measurable_abs_powr that(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?f \<in> borel_measurable ?M \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<lambda>x. \<bar>?f x\<bar> powr ?p) \<in> borel_measurable ?M
  f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p)
    \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
by blast

proof (state)
this:

  \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)

goal (3 subgoals):

let ?g = "\<lambda>x. max 1 (norm(f x) powr enn2real q)"

have "?g absolutely_integrable_on S"

then

picking this:

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

using absolutely_integrable_abs_iff

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<lambda>x. max 1 (norm (f x) powr enn2real q)) absolutely_integrable_on
  S
  (?f absolutely_integrable_on ?S) =
  (?f integrable_on ?S \<and>
   (\<lambda>x.
       \<Sum>i\<in>Basis.
         \<bar>?f x \<bullet> i\<bar> *\<^sub>R i) integrable_on
   ?S)

goal (1 subgoal):

this:
  (\<lambda>x. max 1 (norm (f x) powr enn2real q)) integrable_on S

       \<le> max 1 (norm (f x) powr enn2real q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p \<le> \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real q
using assms enn2real_mono powr_mono that

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) q
  S \<in> lmeasurable
  0 < p
  p \<le> q
  q < \<infinity>
  \<lbrakk>?a \<le> ?b; ?b < \<top>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> enn2real ?a \<le> enn2real ?b
  \<lbrakk>?a \<le> ?b; 1 \<le> ?x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?x powr ?a \<le> ?x powr ?b
  1 \<le> \<bar>f x\<bar>

  \<Longrightarrow> ?x powr ?a \<le> 1

this:
  \<lbrakk>f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S);

  \<Longrightarrow> (\<lambda>x.
                        \<bar>f x\<bar> powr enn2real p) integrable_on
                    S

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma lspace_inclusion:
  assumes "S \<in> lmeasurable" and "p > 0" "p \<le> q" "q < \<infinity>"
  shows "lspace (lebesgue_on S) q \<subseteq> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) q \<subseteq> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
using assms lspace_mono

proof (prove)
using this:
  S \<in> lmeasurable
  0 < p
  p \<le> q
  q < \<infinity>
  \<lbrakk>?f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on ?S) ?q; ?S \<in> lmeasurable;
   0 < ?p; ?p \<le> ?q; ?q < \<infinity>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on ?S) ?p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace (lebesgue_on S) q \<subseteq> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p
by auto

lemma lspace_const:
  fixes p::real
  assumes "p > 0""S \<in> lmeasurable"
  shows "(\<lambda>x. c) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. c) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p)
by (simp add: Lp_space assms finite_measure.integrable_const finite_measure_lebesgue_on)

lemma lspace_max:
  fixes p::real
  assumes "f \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p" "g \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p" "p > 0"
  shows "(\<lambda>x. max (f x) (g x)) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) p"

proof (prove)

proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. max (f x) (g x)) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p)

have "integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)"
    if f: "f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)" "integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr p)"
      and g: "g \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)" "integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>g x\<bar> powr p)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. integrable (lebesgue_on S)
     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. integrable (lebesgue_on S)
     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)
have "integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)" "integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. integrable (lebesgue_on S)
     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>) &&&
    integrable (lebesgue_on S)
     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)
using integrable_abs that

proof (prove)
using this:
  integrable ?M ?f \<Longrightarrow>
  integrable ?M (\<lambda>x. \<bar>?f x\<bar>)
  f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
  integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr p)
  g \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
  integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>g x\<bar> powr p)

goal (1 subgoal):

     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>) &&&

     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)

  integrable (lebesgue_on S)
   (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)

goal (1 subgoal):

     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)

picking this:

  integrable (lebesgue_on S)
   (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)
have "integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. max (\<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>) (\<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>))"

using this:

  integrable (lebesgue_on S)

using integrable_max

  integrable (lebesgue_on S)
   (\<lambda>x. \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)
  \<lbrakk>integrable ?M ?f; integrable ?M ?g\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> integrable ?M (\<lambda>x. max (?f x) (?g x))

 1. integrable (lebesgue_on S)
     (\<lambda>x.
         max \<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>

     (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)
    \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
 2. AE x in lebesgue_on
             S. norm (\<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)
                \<le> norm
                       (max \<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>
                         \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)
show "(\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p) \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)
    \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
using borel_measurable_max measurable_abs_powr that

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?f \<in> borel_measurable ?M;
   ?g \<in> borel_measurable ?M\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (\<lambda>x. max (?g x) (?f x))
                    \<in> borel_measurable ?M
  ?f \<in> borel_measurable ?M \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<lambda>x. \<bar>?f x\<bar> powr ?p) \<in> borel_measurable ?M
  f \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
  integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr p)
  g \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
  integrable (lebesgue_on S) (\<lambda>x. \<bar>g x\<bar> powr p)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)
    \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)
by blast

this:

  \<in> borel_measurable (lebesgue_on S)

                \<le> norm
                       (max \<bar>\<bar>f x\<bar> powr p\<bar>
                         \<bar>\<bar>g x\<bar> powr p\<bar>)
qed auto

proof (state)
this:
  integrable (lebesgue_on S)
   (\<lambda>x. \<bar>max (f x) (g x)\<bar> powr p)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
then
show ?thesis
using assms
by (auto simp: Lp_space borel_measurable_max)

  (\<lambda>x. max (f x) (g x)) \<in> lspace (lebesgue_on S) (ennreal p)

No subgoals!
qed

lemma Lp_space_numeral:
  assumes "numeral n > (0::int)"
  shows "space\<^sub>N (\<LL> (numeral n) M) = {f \<in> borel_measurable M. integrable M (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> ^ numeral n)}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace M (numeral n) =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable M.
     integrable M (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> ^ numeral n)}
using Lp_space [of "numeral n" M] assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < numeral n \<Longrightarrow>
  lspace M (ennreal (numeral n)) =
  {f \<in> borel_measurable M.
   integrable M (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> powr numeral n)}
  0 < numeral n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lspace M (numeral n) =
    {f \<in> borel_measurable M.
     integrable M (\<lambda>x. \<bar>f x\<bar> ^ numeral n)}
by simp
end
